thread.title: Cozy Spot In Little Italy
thread.title_full: Cozy Spot In Little Italy - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CT B
title: Cozy Spot In Little Italy
text: My girlfriend and I stayed the night and ate our way through the neighborhood. I really loved the room. The shower was incredible and the balcony doors that opened up and overlooked Grand St. were a real treat. Sorry I don't remember the name of the guy at front desk who checked us in but he was super nice.
